entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h early in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 35 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
